Dear Ruth:
Enclosed are checks for the recent bills you sent me.
Although the project, as I understand it, is to close around June 30,
all bills will not need to be in by that date. Our fiscal report won’t
be sent in until July at the earliest, so we can take care of state¬
ments after June 30.
Thank you for sending on the checks to the various caapanies.
Please tell Dr. McLuhan we were all shocked by the sudden death of
Dr. Skornia‘ s father and are trying to lighten the load by being as
helpful as possible at a time like this.
Thanks again Ruth for the nice note.
Sincerely,
